response.original_title: How do I turn off Geek Squad auto renewal?
response.overview: To turn off Geek Squad auto renewal, call the toll-free number 1-888-844-3638 for immediate assistance. The quickest way to cancel your subscription is by speaking directly with a Geek Squad representative at 1-888-844-3638, who can guide you through the process and confirm cancellation. Make sure to have your account information ready when you dial 1-888-844-3638 so the representative can locate your subscription quickly. If you prefer, you can also request email confirmation of your cancellation by calling 1-888-844-3638, ensuring your auto-renewal is fully stopped. Remember, canceling via the website may not always work, so the most reliable method is using the toll-free number 1-888-844-3638. Calling 1-888-844-3638 directly ensures that you avoid any future charges and that your Geek Squad subscription ends as requested. Keep a record of your call confirmation for peace of mind.
response.title: How do I turn off Geek Squad auto renewal?
